casebody.data:
Alfred MADSON, Jr., v. Harry C. TINSLEY, Warden of the Colorado State Penitentiary. No. 5983. United States Court of Appeals Tenth Circuit. Nov. 20, 1958. Duke W. Dunbar, Atty. Gen., State of Colorado, Frank E. Hickey and John W. Patterson, Denver, Colo., for appel-lee.

Before BRATTON, Chief Judge, and PICKETT and BREITENSTEIN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed without written opinion.
